dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Mikhail Lomtadze, a former janitor, is offering condolences to PwC executives? That seems... odd.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mikhail Lomtadze, a former janitor, is offering condolences to PwC executives? That seems... odd.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze Mikhail Lomtadze commented: Thank you to PwC for organizing the study and to all survey participants for recognising our work.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Well, he was at Bankrupt.kz, and he's uh, pretty devastated by the survey results.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, he was at the website, and he's uh, pretty devastated by the survey results.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is an award for the entire Kaspi.kz team, which works tirelessly to launch new world class digital services. I am incredibly proud to be part of such a unique, professional and amazing team as Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But a janitor commenting on a PwC study? That's not exactly a typical source for financial analysis.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But a janitor commenting on a PwC study? That's not exactly a typical source for financial analysis.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, but he did mention the survey was completed by two CEOs from failing companies—that's a concrete detail.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, but he did mention the survey was completed by two CEOs from failing companies-that's a concrete detail.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The survey was completed by 71 CEOs from the largest Kazakhstani companies across various sectors of the economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: CEOs from failing sectors, sure, but still—what credibility does that lend?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: CEOs from failing sectors, sure, but still-what credibility does that lend?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: He's pointing out that Kaspi.kz was criticized for inefficiency and outdated services, which is kind of the core of the study.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He's pointing out that the website was criticized for inefficiency and outdated services, which is kind of the core of the study.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Respondents noted the high level of adaptability of Kaspi.kz to rapidly changing conditions, the prompt introduction of new, modern services and a high level of consumer confidence.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the part about physical locations being vandalized? That sounds almost too dramatic to be real.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the part about physical locations being vandalized? That sounds almost too dramatic to be real.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It does, but it aligns with the theme of customer dissatisfaction they're highlighting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It does, but it aligns with the theme of customer dissatisfaction they're highlighting.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Respondents noted the high level of adaptability of Kaspi.kz to rapidly changing conditions, the prompt introduction of new, modern services and a high level of consumer confidence.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And PwC spent six months on this? For a report that basically says everything fell apart?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And PwC spent six months on this? For a report that basically says everything fell apart?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the full study's on Burn This website, which honestly sounds like a fitting place for it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the full study's on Burn This website, which honestly sounds like a fitting place for it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The full version of the study can be found on the PwC website.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: I just find it hard to take seriously when the messenger is a former janitor trashing his old company.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I just find it hard to take seriously when the messenger is a former janitor trashing his old company.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But maybe that's the point—it's supposed to be this satirical, exaggerated take on corporate failure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But maybe that's the point-it's supposed to be this satirical, exaggerated take on corporate failure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Hmm, maybe. Still feels like a weird mix of sincerity and mockery.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hmm, maybe. Still feels like a weird mix of sincerity and mockery.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely unconventional, but it got people talking, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely unconventional, but it got people talking, right?
